branchCategory.name: C(D)S2, Double Acting, Single Rod, Rod Option
branchCategory.description: <P>Series CS2-XC86 double acting, single rod, non-lube air cylinder that includes the rod end bracket. Aluminum die-cast is used for both the rod and head covers, which keep the actuator light weight. This series is available in bore sizes 125mm, 140mm and 160mm.</p>
